title: Is there a company with worse customer service than Google?
content:
I contacted Google in July 2020 to inform them that my Google pixel is overheating (only 6 months old). 102 emails on / 12 Google's reps later and more importantly 4 months on from when the issue was raised and I am still currently in the exact same position despite having 2 years warranty upon purchase.
NEVER PURCHASING A GOOGLE PRODUCT AGAIN AND WOULD ADVISE EVERYONE ELSE TO DO THE SAME
